fields.label: translate:: Type
fields.description: translate:: Optional media to display above the question.

semantics.label: translate:: Task description
semantics.placeholder: translate:: Please listen carefully and write what you hear.

fields.label: translate:: Description
fields.description: translate:: You can optionally put a simple description above the text input field, useful e.g. for dialogues.

fields.label: translate:: Sound sample
fields.description: translate:: Sentence spoken in normal speed

fields.label: translate:: Sound sample slow
fields.description: translate:: Sentence spoken in slow speed

fields.label: translate:: Text
fields.description: translate:: Text that should be written. You can add alternate spellings to a word by adding a vertical line (|) behind followed by an alternative.

fields.label: translate:: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: translate:: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: translate:: Feedback for defined score range

semantics.label: translate:: Behavioural settings
semantics.description: translate:: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: translate:: Maximum tries
fields.description: translate:: Will limit the number of times the samples for each sentence can be listened to.

fields.label: translate:: Maximum tries for slow speed
fields.description: translate:: Will limit the number of times the slow samples for each sentence can be listened to.

fields.label: translate:: Ignore Punctuation marks
fields.description: translate:: If checked, punctuation marks will not be considerd for scoring.

fields.label: translate:: Custom typo display
fields.description: translate:: If checked, typos will be displayed in a custom style distinguishing them from clear mistakes.

fields.label: translate:: Value of typos
fields.description: translate:: Determine to which extent typing errors (word with 3-9 characters: up to 1 mistake, word with more than 9 characters: up to 2 mistakes) count as a real mistake.

fields.label: translate:: Presentation of alternate solutions
fields.description: translate:: Define which alternatives should be presented for wrong or missing words in the solution.

fields.label: translate:: Writing direction
fields.description: translate:: Set whether the sentences' language is right-to-left or left-to-right.

fields.label: translate:: Splitting of characters
fields.description: translate:: Activate if particular characters (e.g. Chinese Han characters) should be split into separate words automatically.

fields.label: translate:: General feedback
fields.description: translate:: You can use several placeholders that will be replaced with the adequate number: @matches = number of matches, @total = total mistakes, @capped = capped total mistakes, @wrong = wrong words, @added = additional words, @missing = missing words, @typo = typing errors

fields.label: translate:: Audio not supported message
fields.default: translate:: Your browser does not support this audio.

fields.label: translate:: Tries left (text for readspeakers and hover text)
fields.description: translate:: @number will be replaced by the current number of tries left.

fields.label: translate:: Infinite (text for readspeakers and hover text)
translate:: Enter text field
fields.default: translate:: Enter what you have heard.

fields.label: translate:: Your result
fields.description: translate:: @score will be replaced by the number of points. @total will be replaced by the maximum possible points.
fields.default: translate:: You got @score out of @total points
